captions:
Looking for fast, mobile, accurate, and reliable metal analysis? At Bronneberg, we offer state-of-the-art SciAps Inc. Metall Analyzers that bring precision and portability together for superior performance in metal identification and sorting.
Explore our two leading models:

🔹 XRF Analyzer X-200: The perfect solution for scrap metal sorting and positive material identification (PMI). With advanced X-ray fluorescence technology, it delivers rapid and precise results even on the most challenging materials.
🔹 Laser Analyzer Z-70: Experience the power of laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy (LIBS) for fast alloy analysis. Ideal for high-speed sorting and accurate analysis of magnesium, aluminum, and other light elements.

With SciAps Analyzers, you’ll save time, improve productivity, and boost profitability in your metal recycling operations.
📩 Contact us today for a demonstration or to find the right solution for your needs!

👉 Discover more: https://lnkd.in/eUJtWMmq

Metall Analyzers that bring precision and portability together for superior performance in metal identification and sorting.
Explore our two leading models:

🔹 XRF Analyzer X-200: The perfect solution for scrap metal sorting and positive material identification (PMI). With advanced X-ray fluorescence technology, it delivers rapid and precise results even on the most challenging materials.
🔹 Laser Analyzer Z-70: Experience the power of laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy (LIBS) for fast alloy analysis. Ideal for high-speed sorting and accurate analysis of magnesium, aluminum, and other light elements.

With SciAps Analyzers, you’ll save time, improve productivity, and boost profitability in your metal recycling operations.
📩 Contact us today for a demonstration or to find the right solution for your needs!

Bronneberg B.V. is een begrip in de markt. Schrootverwerkers spreken vaak met liefde over hun eerste Bronneberg schaar dan wel pers. Ze veroorzaakten decennia geleden al een kleine revolutie in de branche, en doen dat nog steeds. Achter iedere Bronneberg machine zit namelijk een gedachte, want die is altijd nét wat efficiënter, sneller of slimmer dan een machine van een ‘vreemd’ merk. 

“We investeren in de persoonlijke ontwikkeling van onze medewerkers en zorgen ervoor dat iedereen zich onderdeel voelt van de Bronneberg familie”, vertelt Michiel J..

Ontdek het volledige gesprek via https://lnkd.in/e-rDM6wq
 
📷 Henri Jegerings , Robbert-Jan Jegerings, Alexander Jegerings, Michiel J.

📖 Wenst u het ✨ Jubileumboek ✨ gratis als hardcopy ontvangen inclusief dit artikel? Aarzel dan zeker niet om dit even te laten weten in de opmerkingen hieronder en dan brengen wij dit in orde.

#recycling #afval #schroot #metalsBronneberg B.V. is een begrip in de markt. Schrootverwerkers spreken vaak met liefde over hun eerste Bronneberg schaar dan wel pers. Ze veroorzaakten decennia geleden al een kleine revolutie in de branche, en doen dat nog steeds. Achter iedere Bronneberg machine zit namelijk een gedachte, want die is altijd nét wat efficiënter, sneller of slimmer dan een machine van een ‘vreemd’ merk. 

“We investeren in de persoonlijke ontwikkeling van onze medewerkers en zorgen ervoor dat iedereen zich onderdeel voelt van de Bronneberg familie”, vertelt Michiel J..

Ontdek het volledige gesprek via https://lnkd.in/e-rDM6wq
 
📷 Henri Jegerings , Robbert-Jan Jegerings, Alexander Jegerings, Michiel J.

📢 Last week, the #REEPRODUCE consortium met at Bronneberg B.V. 👏 

The consortium engaged in productive discussions around key objectives, strategies and next steps to ensure the success of our collaborative efforts🤝

During the first half of the project, significant progress has been made in advancing recycling technologies for devices containing Neodymium (Nd) magnets. The #REEPRODUCE consortium initiated demonstration phases, focusing on validating innovative recycling processes across multiple facilities in Europe. At this stage the consortium has successfully constructed five pilots (TRL7) and carried out demonstration trials in two of them, marking a significant step forward in achieving the project’s objective.

The partners had the opportunity to visit Bronneberg B.V.'s facilities to explore the innovative pilots that FAU Erlangen-Nürnberg (Institute FAPS) and Bronneberg have developed to extract Nd-based magnets blocks from different components of selected end-of-life products, with validation planned for early 2025.

Exciting times ahead as we work together to drive innovation and deliver impactful results❗ ♻️🌍

Don’t miss out—give us a follow and help spread the word 📢 

💻Visit our website: https://www.reeproduce.eu/
📰Subscribe to our newsletter: https://lnkd.in/eUn93-xd

Meet the consortium 🤝 https://lnkd.in/exXnDuvy

🔧✨ 𝗦𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗴𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗿𝗲𝗰𝘆𝗰𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗼𝗴𝗲𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿!

At Bronneberg, we’re thrilled to announce our partnership with Dutch Magnetics B.V., bringing magnetic solutions to the recycling industry. Together, we’re making it easier for businesses to achieve cleaner, more efficient recycling processes.

Here’s how Dutch Magnetics' state-of-the-art technology is elevating recycling:
🔹 𝗘𝗱𝗱𝘆 𝗖𝘂𝗿𝗿𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 for separating non-ferrous metals with precision.
🔹 𝗠𝗮𝗴𝗻𝗲𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗗𝗿𝘂𝗺 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗹𝘀 to simplify material handling and sorting.
🔹 𝗢𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗯𝗲𝗹𝘁 𝗠𝗮𝗴𝗻𝗲𝘁𝘀 to separate ferrous from non-ferrous metals.
🔹 And more

Have a look at their website for more information: https://lnkd.in/endzY-D7

#RecyclingInnovation #MagneticSolutions #CircularEconomy #Bronneberg #DutchMagnetics #RecyclingTechnology #Sustainability #GreenSolutions #WasteManagement #RecyclingEfficiency

It was fantastic to see our Industrial Cutting Tools in action at Van der Ven Auto's , largest car recycler in the Netherlands, handling over 40,000 cars per year with a recycling rate of 98%.

Our Dutch partner for Industrial Cutting tools, Bronneberg B.V. ensures Van der Ven is equipped with the right tools, expert service, and reliable repairs. Partnership is a key factor in being successful in our markets. Our cooperation with Bronneberg is a perfect example of how to be successful by joining forces and knowledge. 

Are you curious to learn more about both our solutions for industrial recycling and cutting? Visit Alexander Jegerings, Ivo Willems and me next week at our joined booth during the Bureau of Middle East Recycling conference - 25 and 26 November - Le Méridien Dubai Hotel & Conference!

#holmatro #industrialcutting #wehelpmaketheworldmoveforward #recycling #demolition #production #decommissioning 
#hydraulics #hydrauliccutting #highpressurehydraulics #safe

Met trots delen wij dat Bronneberg partner is van Hartstichting: Hart voor de Zaak! (English Below) 

Wij vinden het belangrijk betrokken te zijn bij maatschappelijke doelen en willen dit ook vertalen binnen onze organisatie. De gezondheid en welzijn van onze mensen staat hierbij centraal.

Samen gaan wij voor een gezonder hart, voor nu én later! ❤️

----------------------------------(English)----------------------------------
With pride we can announce that Bronneberg is partner of Hartstichting: Hart voor de Zaak!

We believe it is important to be involved in social goals and want to express this in our organization. The health and well being of our employees is one of our core values.

Together we go for a healthier heart, for now and later! ❤️

**Curea Elektro AG – Leidenschaft für nachhaltige Entsorgung**
 
Curea testet derzeit im Herstellerwerk der Firma Bronneberg B.V. (NL) eine Abisoliermaschine, die Kupfer und Kunststoff effektiv voneinander trennt. Diese Technologie könnte einen bedeutenden Mehrwert für die Zukunft bringen, indem sie ressourcenschonende Recyclingprozesse fördert und die Nachhaltigkeit verbessert.**Curea Elektro AG – Leidenschaft für nachhaltige Entsorgung**
 
Curea testet derzeit im Herstellerwerk der Firma Bronneberg B.V. (NL) eine Abisoliermaschine, die Kupfer und Kunststoff effektiv voneinander trennt. Diese Technologie könnte einen bedeutenden Mehrwert für die Zukunft bringen, indem sie ressourcenschonende Recyclingprozesse fördert und die Nachhaltigkeit verbessert.

𝗘𝗫𝗛𝗜𝗕𝗜𝗧𝗢𝗥 𝗔𝗡𝗡𝗢𝗨𝗡𝗖𝗘𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧 🇸🇦  

𝘞𝘦 𝘩𝘢𝘷𝘦 𝘢 𝘭𝘰𝘯𝘨 𝘭𝘪𝘴𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘦𝘹𝘩𝘪𝘣𝘪𝘵𝘰𝘳 𝘢𝘯𝘯𝘰𝘶𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘴. 
𝘈𝘭𝘭 𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘧𝘪𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘥 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘥𝘺 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘳𝘦𝘤𝘺𝘤𝘭𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘬𝘦𝘵 𝘪𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘔𝘪𝘥𝘥𝘭𝘦 𝘌𝘢𝘴𝘵,𝘰𝘯𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘮 𝘪𝘴 𝘉𝘳𝘰𝘯𝘯𝘦𝘣𝘦𝘳𝘨 𝘉.𝘝..🇳🇱 

𝗔𝗯𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝗕𝗿𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗯𝗲𝗿𝗴 𝗕.𝗩. – 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝘂𝗳𝗮𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝗿 𝗼𝗳 𝗦𝗰𝗿𝗮𝗽 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝘆𝗰𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗘𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁

Bronneberg B.V. specializes in engineering and manufacturing advanced hydraulic systems for the recycling industry, including:

• Scrap guillotine shears
• Scrap balers
• Cable recycling plants & cable strippers
• Cable Stripping Machines
• Alligator Shears

...and more!

Bronneberg B.V. offers worldwide delivery of complete, turnkey recycling plants and provides servicing for all brands of equipment. See them in November on the 10th & 11th at the Recycling Expo in Riyadh!

Bronneberg B.V. specializes in engineering and manufacturing advanced hydraulic systems for the recycling industry, including:

• Scrap guillotine shears
• Scrap balers
• Cable recycling plants & cable strippers
• Cable Stripping Machines
• Alligator Shears

...and more!

Bronneberg B.V. offers worldwide delivery of complete, turnkey recycling plants and provides servicing for all brands of equipment. See them in November on the 10th & 11th at the Recycling Expo in Riyadh!

Die Curea Elektro AG ist nachhaltig in ihrem Vorgehen und hat kürzlich neue Kabelschälmaschinen in Betrieb genommen. Die Maschinen sind mit austauschbaren Zug- und Schneidrollen ausgestattet, was es ermöglicht, verschiedene Kabeltypen mit derselben Maschine zu verarbeiten. Dank der einfachen Bedienung können die Kabel schnell und effizient abgemantelt werden.
